Technosis: Thank you, you are kind to me.

Technosis goes back to Zeni and lays him down, wrapping him up in a blanket.

Technosis: You'll need to rest until Trinity gets out, we only have one CR
Chamber.

Zeni: Okay. It's hard to sleep like this, it hurts.

Technosis' eyes fill with tears and she grabs Zeni and hugs him close to
her.

Technosis: I'll hold onto you, no bads will come to you.

Perplex thinking: Why is she so concerned over us? Oh well, Zeni likes her
so I'll make sure she sticks around and stays happy. Which shouldn't be too
hard to do.

Perplex watches Technosis carefully. Zeni falls asleep.

Perplex: WHAT? How did you do that?

Technosis: I have a way with kids.

Perplex: More so than me, your simply amazing.

Technosis: Not really, I'm just a plain ordinary everyday technology...
